entry.content:
Joe Bostian

under construction ...

Welcome to my personal repo. I interact a lot with open source at work, and the things I post here are my experiences - either with a work-related project, or just for fun. A lot of what I do can be found through my work id - jbostian. My current project is at https://izoda.github.io/.

I work a lot with Linux and Python, particularly in the data science arena, so these areas form the center of gravity for the posts you'll find here. I hope that some of my experiences are of use to you.

Please interact with me here, or look me up on Linkedin if you want to know more about my background.
